definition[0]: used in a business letter or email to show that you are sending a copy to someone else
example[0]: To Neil Fry, cc: Anthea Baker, Matt Fox
definition[1]: the abbreviation of cubic centimetre or cubic centimetres
definition[2]: used on letters, documents, and E-MAILs to show that a copy has also been sent to someone in addition to the person to whom it is addressed
example[2]: To Neil Fry, cc Anthea Baker, Matt Fox
definition[3]: to send a copy of a letter, document, or E-MAIL addressed to one person to another person
example[3]: Can you send a memo to Bill and cc it to the sales team.
